column4: hi  people is there any chance to switch off-on power from usb in ubuntu- terminal?
probably not, i think the linux sleeping drivers are all still a WIP (work in progress... for any linux, not just ubuntu)
device sleeping/waking is still *problematic with linux
but the "end" devices with their own "power" switch, of course they turn off themselves, but the usb port of the computer is still listening with power on
